channel.title: A guide to spawning
channel.description: i need a guide tht will work thanks

item.title: A guide to spawning
item.dc:creator: @TheJoker619 TheJoker619
item.description:
@TheJoker619 wrote:

Yes, thats correct, you need the Item ID and the amount you want for exampe:

Type this in the game-
::pickup 0995 1000000

-0995 is the ID for money, and 1000000 is the amount of money you’ll get-
It should work like this, once type that in and enter you should get 100K cash of gp.

*Note that only Administrators can use the spawning code, but you could change it so that it everyone can use it, althought I don’t know any java script

Anyhow, ‘::pickup’ makes the item appear in your inventory, if you wish to have the item spawn on the ground you would type this during gameplay:
::item ItemID AmountOfThatItem

Most spawning codes don’t work sometimes, such as the money code I think.

Thats what I know…
hope it helps, and if you want a list of item codes, try going to the item list in your server and search it up.

Read full topic

item.title: A guide to spawning
item.dc:creator: @Canttouchthis Canttouchthis
item.description:
@Canttouchthis wrote:

when u are playing rs2 type the following

::pickup iteamid theamountuwantoftheiteam

for example

::pickup 4769 100

then hit enter when u hit enter u should see an ahrims hood in ur invo if u used that id i use for example.
